Package com.neolabs.employeesworktime.repository

Interface WorkingTimeRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<WorkingTime,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<WorkingTime,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<WorkingTime,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<WorkingTime>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<WorkingTime,Long>
@Repository public interface WorkingTimeRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<WorkingTime,Long>

  • Method Details

    • findWorkingTimeByEmployeeId

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEESWORKINGTIMES WHERE EMPLOYEEID = :employeeId ", nativeQuery=true) List<WorkingTime> findWorkingTimeByEmployeeId(Long employeeId)
      Query para obtener los registros de TODOS los turnos cargados por EMPLEADO
      Parameters:
      employeeId - del empleado

    • findWorkingTimeByEmployeeIdAndWorkingType

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEESWORKINGTIMES WHERE EMPLOYEEID = :employeeId AND WORKING_TYPEID = :workingTypeId", nativeQuery=true) List<WorkingTime> findWorkingTimeByEmployeeIdAndWorkingType(Long employeeId, Long workingTypeId)
      Query para obtener los registros definiendo TIPO DE TURNO y EMPLEADO
      Parameters:
      employeeId - del empleado
      workingTypeId - tipo de turno

    • findWorkingTimeByEmployeeIdAndWorkingTypeAndDate

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEESWORKINGTIMES WHERE EMPLOYEEID = :employeeId AND WORKING_TYPEID = :workingTypeId AND DATE = :workingTimeDate", nativeQuery=true) List<WorkingTime> findWorkingTimeByEmployeeIdAndWorkingTypeAndDate(Long employeeId, Long workingTypeId, LocalDate workingTimeDate)
      Query para obtener los registros de turnos cargados por empleado y fecha
      Parameters:
      employeeId - del empleado
      workingTypeId - tipo de turno
      workingTimeDate - fecha de la jornada laboral

    • findWorkingTimeByEmployeeAndDate

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEESWORKINGTIMES WHERE EMPLOYEEID = :employeeId AND DATE = :workingTimeDate", nativeQuery=true) List<WorkingTime> findWorkingTimeByEmployeeAndDate(Long employeeId, LocalDate workingTimeDate)
      Query por empleado y por fecha
      Parameters:
      employeeId - del empleado
      workingTimeDate - fecha
